comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of patients checked by the electronic thermometer
- y: number of patients checked by the regular thermometer

Definitions:
- x: number of patients checked by the electronic thermometer
- y: number of patients checked by the regular thermometer

Extracted Constraints:
1. x \geq 2y (At least twice as many patients should have their temperature checked by the electronic thermometer than the regular thermometer)
2. y \geq 50 (At least 50 patients should have their temperature checked by a regular thermometer)
3. 3x + 2y \leq 15000 (Total time taken by both thermometers should not exceed 15000 minutes)

Extracted Objective:
- Maximize z = x + y (Maximize the number of patients whose temperature can be taken)
